title: F/S T206 Carl Lundgren Chicago PSA 4

posts.post_title: F/S T206 Carl Lundgren Chicago PSA 4
posts.post_content: For Sale: T206 Carl Lundgren tough Chicago version PSA 4 in a Piedmont 150 back. $475.00 shipped. Payment as paypal money owed, check, or postal money order. First person that PM's or e-mails me that wants it, gets it.
